<p style="font-family: 'Crimson Text', serif; font-size: 3rem; color: #323619; font-style: italic; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0.3rem;">all things genomics, bioinformatics & sustainability</p>


Computational work is often a solo activity-just you, your code, and a gene network. But the big challenges aren't tackled alone: crops failing, climates shifting, farmers adapting. These need collective solutions.

This blog is my way of connecting the dots and engaging beyond the screen. I write about the technical stuff I'm learning and the broader issues it touches (and some other things inbetween). Light on jargon, heavy on curiosity.
